tha-ap399:4.3: pitā matā bhātā → mātā pitā ca bhātā ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap399:16.2: saṃ tacaṃ → santavaṃ (bj) | santanuṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | saṃ tanuṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap399:18.2: girimañjariṃ → girimañjarimapūjayiṃ (bj) | girimañjari pūjayiṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | girapañjaliṃ pūjayiṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap399:18.3: Dibbagandhaṃ sampavantaṃ → dibbagandhena sampannaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap399:24.2: atulopi → atulo ca (bj) | atulopi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | mahāsamuddo vākkhobbho atulo pi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
